Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

Doing a satellite contract. And as you can see in the picture, I've met all the requirements except for one. I built all the components to the ship after accepting the contract. I have 4 antennas, 4 "fold out" antennas, and 4 battery packs that still have charge. I've extended all the antenna's too. I've even launched it again and changed the flag to the contractors flag .... i don't know what else to do. Can anyone help?

link to image if it doesn't show up: http://i.imgur.com/AI0qvwk.jpg?2

- Apache600

Edited December 18, 2014 by Apache600
The ship needs solar panels. This should be made more clear by the contract saying 'sustainable power'.
Your welcome! Also, in the future, use the F1 key to take screenshots.

In the future, instead of taking a picture, click F1 to take a screenshot of the entire screen (essentially a photo).

Then upload this screenshot with tinypic.com (or a related site. There are alot of upload sites).

Alternatively, if you use steam, you can take a screenshot with F12. When you close the game, there will be a screen that lets you upload the screenshots directly. After upload, hit view online, right click on the screenshot and hit 'Copy Page URL'

Then paste that link here so we can see it
...you took a photograph of your monitor? that's pretty funny.
.... i suck at life sometimes
This was exactly my problem, I haven't unlocked solar panels though

This was exactly my problem, I haven't unlocked solar panels though

Hmm, it really shouldn't give you those contracts before you unlock panels
its' because the launch clamps provide power. sadly you can't take them to space
